title: 60's Album Cover Fonts
content:
Hi...hoping to find out the names of all the fonts in the sample...the artist, title and the MGM logo, top and bottom.

Thanks as always...always appreciated.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150121022813im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Moon-Gas-Face_4294.jpg)
author: matango07030

comments.content:
|MOON GAS| is Helvetica 93 Ext Black:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/neue-helvetica/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150121022813/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/neue-helvetica/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/neue-helvetica/")

|DICK HYMAN| appears to be Anzeigen Grotesk:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/anzeigen-grotesk-lt/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150121022813/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/anzeigen-grotesk-lt/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/anzeigen-grotesk-lt/")

|MARY MAYO| might be Unit Gothic 717:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/hwt/hwt-unit-gothic/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150121022813/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hwt/hwt-unit-gothic/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/hwt/hwt-unit-gothic/")

|MGM| is too small for an accurate ID, but Vitesse Sans Bold by Hoefler & Co. or Eurostile Heavy might work.

I think you're right about Eurostile - the "HIGH FIDELITY" at the bottom has the appearance of Eurostile condensed.

- Lex
Thanks to you both...you're amazing. Eurostile worked well, thanks and the others were spot on. Super appreciated.
